title: Packers Escape the Bears, Cowboys Low Ceiling, Steelers Roller Coaster and More NFL Reaction!
itunes:title: Packers Escape the Bears, Cowboys Low Ceiling, Steelers Roller Coaster and More NFL Reaction!
description:
Colin discusses why the Green Bay Packers didn't really beat the Chicago Bears last night, the problems with Dallas Cowboys QB Dak Prescott, why the Pittsburgh Steelers are like a roller coaster, why he prefers New England Patriots QB Tom Brady over Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Michael Vick, Greg Jennings and Tony Gonzalez.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
